abstract: President Obama continued plugging his jobs plan, even as White House officials acknowledged that the bill's prospects in the Senate were tenuous.
snippet: President Obama continued plugging his jobs plan, even as White House officials acknowledged that the bill's prospects in the Senate were tenuous.
lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH - President Obama continued the drumbeat for his jobs plan on Tuesday, even as White House officials acknowledged that the bill's prospects in the Senate were tenuous and Mr. Obama himself vowed not to wait for Congress to advance ideas to get American back to work.

headline.main: Obama Pushes Jobs Plan as Senate Prepares to Vote
